title: Virtual Reality - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/12/17
itunes:title: Virtual Reality - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/12/17
description:
George Noory and guest Steve Aukstakalnis discuss his research into virtual and augmented reality and how the developing technology will change the worlds of education, the military and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
